director.name: 娜代日达·科塞娃 Nadejda Koseva

introduction: The story revolves around a 250 kg wild boar brought to a Danube village in order to be ritually shot for a trophy by a wealthy Canadian. Local man Glukhov organises the hunt, expecting the Canadian to help him close a deal for millions of euros. However, Yovo the Beggar — a former miner, owner of an improvised zoo and perpetual joker — intervenes as he is the only one who has a perfect dog for hunting. Glukhov’s plan goes upside down and nothing will fall into place until he sets his old scores with Yovo.
